mapper.insert: insert into warehouse_${storeId} (name, contacts, contact_number, address, postcode, remark) values (#{name}, #{contacts}, #{contactNumber}, #{address}, #{postcode}, #{remark});
mapper.update: update warehouse_${storeId} set name = #{name}, contacts = #{contacts}, contact_number = #{contactNumber}, address = #{address}, postcode = #{postcode}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id};
mapper.select: select id, name, contacts, contact_number, address, postcode, remark from warehouse_${warehouseVo.storeId} limit #{pageVo.page}, #{pageVo.pageSize};
select id, name, contacts, contact_number, address, postcode, remark from warehouse_${storeId} where id = #{id};

SELECT u.id, u.name, u.username, u.password, u.remark, u.disabled FROM warehouse_${storeId} AS w, user_${storeId} AS u, warehouse_user_${storeId} AS wu WHERE w.id = wu.warehouseId AND u.id = wu.user_id AND w.id = #{warehouseId};
